stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit 1 agenda. Remove X bad publicity. X is equal to the agenda point value of the forfeited agenda. Gain 1 credit for each bad publicity removed this way.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit 1 agenda.
Remove X bad publicity. X is equal to the agenda point value of the forfeited agenda. Gain 1[credit] for each bad publicity removed this way.
title: Sacrifice
